{"model": "gpt-4o-mini", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Please provide a comprehensive summary of the following text in exactly 1 sentences.

Content to summarize: Climate change continues to affect ecosystems worldwide at an alarming rate. Rising global temperatures have led to more frequent extreme weather events including hurricanes, floods, and wildfires. Polar ice caps are melting faster than predicted, contributing to sea level rise that threatens coastal communities. Scientists warn that without immediate and dramatic reductions in greenhouse gas emissions, many of these changes may become irreversible. International cooperation remains essential but politically challenging.
